channel.title: Looking for experienced coder to adjust my server a bit. Willing to pay
channel.description:
Hi :)
I have a 525 server however i'm an amatuer coder and i seem to have messed a few things up. The 'offer all' and 'offer 5' doesnt work in trade. nor does 'remove all' 'remove 10' etc.
for $20 would someone be willing to;
- fix trade window. (offer all, offer 5, remove 5, remove 10, remove x, remove all) - add a green crown so that when player rights = 3 and they speak it shows. (like the gold and siver admin and mod crowns) [url=http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj168/Roboticopperatingbuddy/MARSForumModeratorCrown.gif]http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj168/Roboticopperatingbuddy/MARSForumModeratorCrown.gif[/url] <---- Crown link
- remove the stupid insane pks watermark on all my client interfaces. - and just do a general checkup of my server to make sure everything else is okay.
please pm me and we can talk. thank you...

item.title: Looking for experienced coder to adjust my server a bit. Willing to pay
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

i just really want it done.
and i dont think anyone will offer to do it if there isn’t a reward for it

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for experienced coder to adjust my server a bit. Willing to pay
item.dc:creator: @Different2 Different.
item.description:
@Different2 wrote:

What’s wrong with rewarding service? It only pushes the service to work harder and more efficient.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for experienced coder to adjust my server a bit. Willing to pay

item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

Hi

I have a 525 server however i’m an amatuer coder and i seem to have messed a few things up.
The ‘offer all’ and ‘offer 5’ doesnt work in trade. nor does ‘remove all’ ‘remove 10’ etc.

for $20 would someone be willing to;

  • fix trade window. (offer all, offer 5, remove 5, remove 10, remove x, remove all)

  • add a green crown so that when player rights = 3 and they speak it shows. (like the gold and siver admin and mod crowns)
    http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj168/Roboticopperatingbuddy/MARSForumModeratorCrown.gif <---- Crown link

  • remove the stupid insane pks watermark on all my client interfaces.

  • and just do a general checkup of my server to make sure everything else is okay.

please pm me and we can talk.
